Text: FW Power Customer and Transmission AgreementsFrom Calger Christopher F Sent Thursday January AM To Sager Elizabeth Hall Steve Yoder Christian Belden Tim Presto Kevin M Will Lloyd Bailey Debra Bentley Corry Milnthorp Rob Steiner David Abler Bill Cross Edith Curry Mike Donovan Terry W Furrow Dale Llodra John Meyn Jim Pacheco Leonardo Rode Tina Rorschach Reagan Valderrama Larry Wood George Etringer Michael Gustafson Mollie Lackey Chris Mcdonald Michael Shields Jeff Thomas Jake Thome Stephen Wente Laura Woodland Andrea Subject Power Customer and Transmission Agreements The lists have been moved to ocommonpwrmarketing so they are accessible for people in both Houston and Portland Please let me know if you have not been granted access
take it beers are postponed until later this week I hear you may be in Houston

RE beersTuesday I can go anytime you want Just holler when youre ready Great news about UBS Original Message From Swerzbin Mike Sent Friday January PM To Woodland Andrea Subject RE beers how about next Tuesday or Thursday in the late afternoon is fine it would be good to get on the same page with what were doin in the market Thanks let me know whcih day is best for you Mike Original Message From Woodland Andrea Sent Friday January AM To Swerzbin Mike Subject beers Hey Id like to know if I could buy you a beer sometime and pick your brain on how things work in the NW term trading world Im one of the NW midmarketers now of us total and Id like to know in advance how to best work with you add value and not be a pain in your ass Let me know if this is OK You pick the time place Thanks Andrea Woodland

beerslike to know if I could buy you a beer sometime and pick your brain on how things work in the NW term trading world Im one of the NW midmarketers now of us total and Id like to know in advance how to best work with you add value and not be a pain in your ass Let me know if this is OK You pick the time place Thanks Andrea Woodland

Montana Update Cc legal just terminated their contract and Luzenac terminated earlier this month Starting Feb we should be delivering to Ash Grove Cement and LP We are currently delivering to LP and Ash grove suspended for the entire month of Jan Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Andrea Woodland Enron North America West Desk desk cell

Montana Update Cc legal on our Montana customers Let me know if you have any questions Ash Grove They are still under contract suspension and are planning on suspending until the end of the month Plan on delivering power starting Feb Holnam We should be continuing to try to schedule they will refuse thru Jan so we should be invoicing accordingly They will start accepting the schedule for Feb delivery Luzenac They have terminated their contract as of So do not deliver power to them LP Schedule as usual They are looking at buyout of their contracts but in the meantime they want power delivered Andrea Woodland Enron North America West Desk desk cell

RE Luzenac NERC days mean we start delivering on Jan th not the th Original Message From Hall Steve C Legal Sent Monday December AM To Crandall Sean Cutsforth Diane Cc Woodland Andrea Subject Luzenac Luzenac has suspended its contract for NERC business days starting Jan Therefore we will not schedule power to Luzenac during this time or charge Luzenac damages A NERC Business Day is any day except for a Saturday Sunday or NERC holiday By my calculations this means that we will resume deliveries on January th Andrea you might confirm with these guys that they agree with this calculation of dayssch

SmurfitStone Cc legal terminated their power contract with us letter to Enron legal So take them off your list for deliver They will more than likely end up paying a termination payment but they are going out now to lock in the power they need under new agreements Thanks Andrea

Holnam Holcim Cc legal not been able to come to an agreement with Holcim so we need to plan on scheduling power to them next week They will more than likely refuse it but then we need to schedule invoice appropriately Thanks AW

LouisianaPacific Cc legal regarding LP from what we just discussed at my desk They do not want to take the price They are getting out of their other Jan contract and will accept power from Enron starting HE on Jan rd This means we need to reschedule their HLH MWs that was prescheduled today for Jan nd I have told them I will give them weekly updates regarding the power availability We can deliver for all of January but please let me know if anything changes so I can let them know in advance If we drop them again I dont want it to be without notice They are still interested in buying out the contracts but will accept power from Enron until a buyout price is agreed upon Thanks AW

Luzenac America Cc legal had a call with Luzenac and we came to no conclusions We need to try to schedule to them every day for January even though they will refuse Then invoice them appropriately If they refuse to pay the invoice that may allow us to terminate their contract and start the termination payment procedure Ill keep you up to date on any changes Thanks AW

Ash Grove Cement Cc legal note to confirm Ash Grove Cement has suspended their contract until Jan th This means power should not be scheduled for them But if no further remedies are taken by Jan th we should plan on scheduling them starting Jan th I will let you know if anything further develops Thanks AW
